name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.socket-timeout
description: Default timeout value in milliseconds for all sockets.

name: seq.io.sort.factor
description:
The number of streams to merge at once while sorting
      files using SequenceFile.Sorter.
      This determines the number of open file handles.

name: hadoop.security.crypto.buffer.size
description: The buffer size used by CryptoInputStream and CryptoOutputStream.

name: dfs.datanode.slowdisk.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a disk is definitely not slow.

name: dfs.datanode.lazywriter.interval.sec
description: Interval in seconds for Datanodes for lazy persist writes.

name: dfs.provided.aliasmap.inmemory.batch-size
description: The batch size when iterating over the database backing the aliasmap

name: dfs.datanode.metrics.logger.period.seconds
description:
This setting controls how frequently the DataNode logs its metrics. The
    logging configuration must also define one or more appenders for
    DataNodeMetricsLog for the metrics to be logged.
    DataNode metrics logging is disabled if this value is set to zero or
    less than zero.
